info.name: WideTube
info.description:
Wider new youtube
A lot of bug, horrible CSS

*Work only on 1080p display or bigger for now*
info.additionalInfo:

Kinda Fixed the "load more" button (still look awful, can't do anything for this)
Bigger li (scrollbar should appear less often)
Smaller padding between videos
Fixed some bugs
